questions.q: What is the capital of the state of Kansas?
questions.amp: Topeka has a population of almost 130,000.

The 7 continents are Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Australia/Oceania, Europe, North America, and South America. Some geographers reduce this to 6 by combining Europe and Asia into 'Eurasia', since they are on the same landmass.

questions.q: What is the most populous city in Asia?
questions.amp: Shanghai has a population of about 24 million as of 2013, which is the largest municipal population of any city in the world. Moscow is not in Asia; it is in Europe!

questions.q: Which continent has the smallest land area?
questions.amp: Australia is somewhat smaller than Europe. It is less than 1/12 the size of the largest continent, Asia.

questions.q: Which continent has the largest population?
questions.amp: The population of Asia was more than 4 billion people as of 2015.  In contrast, the population of Antarctica is less than 5000 people.
